metadata.Title: CVE-2012-3517 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in dns.c in Tor before 0.2.2.38 might allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (daemon crash) via vectors related to failed DNS requests.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3517` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tor - 0.2.3.22-rc-1
tor-geoipdb - 0.2.3.22-rc-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tor package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.2.3.22-rc-1').
